member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.FlowActions.XadesOptionsModel.DisableXPathTransformation
member.summary: By default the XPath transformation is applied in all XAdES signatures. You can set a flow action to not apply the transformation by setting this option to true. WARNING: If you disable the XPath transformation the signatures might be considered invalid in some validators if the same XML element is signed multiple times.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.TrustServiceProviders.BaseTrustServiceProviderSignRequest.UserTimeZoneOffset
member.summary: The user's timezone offset in minutes, this is the timezone that will appear on the signature's visual representation. This offset is the difference from UTC to the user's time, that is, if the user's timezone is UTC-3 this offset should be -180.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Uploads.UploadBytesModel.Id
member.summary: The ID of the uploaded file so it can be used to create documents.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Uploads.UploadBytesModel.Size
member.summary: The size in bytes of the received file.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Uploads.UploadBytesModel.Digest
member.summary: The MD5 digest (hash) of the received file. Can be used for integrity checks.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Uploads.UploadBytesRequest.Bytes
member.summary: The file bytes encoded in Base 64 format.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Users.ParticipantUserModel.Identifier
member.summary: The user identifier (CPF in Brazil and CÃ©dula de Identidad in Ecuador).

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Users.ParticipantUserModel.Phone
member.summary: The user's mobile phone number. It will be set only if the user does not exist, i.e. it will not override existing user's phones. Must use iternational format, example: +55 11 91234-5678

member.summary: The document's id

member.summary: The document's name

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.DocumentInformationModel.CreationDate

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.DocumentInformationModel.UpdateDate

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.DocumentInformationModel.Folder
member.summary: The document's folder if it has any.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.DocumentInformationModel.Organization
member.summary: The document's organization or null if it is a personal document.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.DocumentInformationModel.CreatedBy
member.summary: The user or application that created the document.

member.name: P:Lacuna.Signer.Api.Webhooks.WebhookModel.Data
